summary: This bill, the "Reducing Excessive Taxation and Inefficiencies by Reforming Elder Exemptions to Support Fairness, Inflation Relief, and Simpler Taxes Act" (RETIREES FIRST Act), amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the income thresholds for including Social Security benefits in taxable income. It also mandates appropriations to offset any reduction in Social Security trust fund transfers due to these changes. Furthermore, it outlines a process to rescind certain non-security discretionary appropriations to fund retiree tax relief.
